profile:
Thank you for your interest in our company. Here is a little more information to help you choose us for your next project.
We are experts in interior and exterior home renovations and repairs.  If you have been contemplating a major kitchen renovation or perhaps you are tired of tripping over the uneven interlock, we can help. We have done it all, big or small. Our goal is to complete the project on time, on budget and to exceed your expectations. Our team is dedicated to providing our clients with the highest quality of service. We take pride in our work and this is evident in the finished product. 

If you would like more information or would like to discuss further, we are just click away. We will reply to your call, text or email promptly. We are happy to answer your questions and provide you with a free quote. Please read the reviews from our previous clients, we hope this will help convince you to be our next satisfied customer. Thank you for this opportunity and we look forward to working with you. 

Call us today to schedule your appointment. 
Website: www.epenhancements.homestars.com 
Email: epenhancements@gmail.com 
Phone: 613-915-9104
services:
Bathroom Renovations,
Basement Renovations,
Kitchen Renovations,
Any Room Renovations,
Hardwood Flooring Install,
Vinyl Flooring Install,

Kitchen Back splash Install,

Any Flooring Install,

Drywall repair,
Any type of insulation install, Crystal Clear Heat Shrink Window Insulation Installation,
Any rooms wall, ceiling, door painting.
Baseboards quarter round,
Crown molding,
6 by 6 pressure treated wood retaining walls,
Interlock retaining walls, Interlock install,
Interlock lifting relay, Interlock repair,
Power washing re-polymeric sand, Garage concrete floor repair, Garage epoxy floor install,
Parging,
Custom culture stone install,
Brick removal and brick, replacement.
Brick re pointers,
Asphalt driveway repair and asphalt garage ramps.
